Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Tjenemet-crown
Description: Tjenemet-crown, most likely the original headdress of the god Sobek. Two ostrich feathers with rounded tips frame a solar disc (positioned abnormally high). This ensemble is place atop a pair of horizontal rams horns, of which only the right one is preserved. The back has not been sculpted, only roughed down.
